introduction: Welcome to the final Tipsrundan of 2020, #26! We wish for a better 2021 & that Tipsrundan grows even more. :)

godisboxen.title: Liquid Core: JS (Node.js) in Android & iOS apps
godisboxen.description: Our very own Anders Hagsten solved a problem where he had to run Node.js in an Android App at his assignment, using LiquidCore! '..LiquidCore enables Node.js virtual machines to run inside Android and iOS apps. It provides a complete runtime environment, including a virtual file system.'.

godisboxen.title: Explain Recurrent Neural Network with Neural Networks
godisboxen.description: Excerpt: '...My goal is to present an explanation that avoids the neural network metaphor, stripping it down to its essenceâ€”a series of vector transformations that result in embeddings for variable-length input vectors.'

godisboxen.title: Simulating RAM in Clojure Simulating RAM in Clojure
godisboxen.description: Wanna learn more about how computers work behind the screen? Then make sure to read this blog!
